metadata.name: Glint
metadata.description: After a catastrophic event wiped out humanity, Glint set out on a journey to explore the world and discover what remains. With their backpack full of supplies and their nimble form, Glint travels from place to place, observing the ruins of civilization and marveling at the beauty of nature reclaiming the land. Despite the dangers and uncertainties of their journey, Glint remains optimistic and brave, always eager to learn and see what lies ahead. With their sparkling eyes guiding the way, Glint is on a quest to discover what the world has become and what their place in it might be.
